overview.en: HPB (High-Performance Blockchain) is a new kind of block chain hardware and software architecture, which includes a chip acceleration engine and the blockchain platform, aiming to realize the performance extension of distributed applications.
overview.zh: HPB(High-Performance Blockchain)是一种全新的区块链软硬件体系架构，其中包含芯片加速引擎和区块链底层平台，旨在实现分布式应用的性能扩展。
